game.name: A Father's Growth Spurt
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장
game.shortDescription: Juggle the tasks of taking care of a bonsai by monitoring the water, fertilizer, and weeds in the same pot, all while witnessing the short linear narrative between the 3 generations of the same family.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Juggle the tasks of taking care of a bonsai by monitoring the water, fertilizer, and weeds in the same pot, all while witnessing the short linear narrative between the 3 generations of the same family.
